Draw a line (line\\_2) with a start point at [0.3855, 0.3495] and an end point at [0.3855, 0.15]. 3. Draw a line (line\\_3) with a start point at [0.3855, 0.15] and an end point at [0.3555, 0.15]. 4. Draw a line (line\\_4) with a start point at [0.3555, 0.15] and an end point at [0.3555, 0.237]. 5. Draw a line (line\\_5) with a start point at [0.3555, 0.237] and an end point at [0.198, 0.237]. 6. Draw a line (line\\_6) with a start point at [0.198, 0.237] and an end point at [0.198, 0.0]. 7. Draw a line (line\\_7) with a start point at [0.198, 0.0] and an end point at [0.5355, 0.0]. 8. Draw a line (line\\_8) with a start point at [0.5355, 0.0] and an end point at [0.5355, 0.4995]. 9. Draw a line (line\\_9) with a start point at [0.5355, 0.4995] and an end point at [0.0, 0.4995]. 10. Draw a line (line\\_10) with a start point at [0.0, 0.4995] and an end point at [0.0, 0.3495]. The dimensions of the rectangular prism are as follows: * Length: 0.5355 * Width: 0.5355 * Height: 0.375 Scale the 2D sketch by a factor of 0.5355. Extrude the 2D sketch along the normal direction by 0.1875 and along the opposite direction by 0.1875 to create the 3D model.
